# TIS-VS
TIS-VS is an integration addon between Valkyrien Skies 2 and TIS-3D. It adds multiple new modules and a new serial protocol. TIS Advanced is **highly recommended** to handle half-point precision floats which a majority of the new modules output.

## New Modules

- [Altitude Module](modules/altitude_module.md)
- [Distance Module](modules/distance_module.md)
- [Gyroscopic Module](modules/gyroscopic_module.md)
- [Omega Module](modules/omega_module.md)
- [Velocity Module](modules/velocity_module.md)

## New Serial Protocols

- [Framed Map](protocols/framed_map.md)
